query.name: _Allele_Disease
query.longDescription: Returns the diseases (MEDIC terms) associated with the specified mouse alleles.

query.name: _Allele_Phenotype
query.longDescription: Returns the phenotypes (MP terms) associated with the specified mouse alleles.

query.name: _Disease_Allele
query.longDescription: Returns the mouse alleles associated with the specified diseases (MEDIC terms) or subterms.

query.name: _Disease_Feature
query.longDescription: Returns genes and other sequence features associated with the specified diseases (MEDIC terms) or their subterms.

query.name: _Disease_Genotype
query.longDescription: Returns genes and other sequence features associated with the specified diseases (MEDIC terms) or their subterms.

query.name: _Feature_Disease
query.longDescription: Returns the diseases (MEDIC terms) associated with the specified genes or other features.

query.name: _Feature_Phenotype
query.longDescription: Returns the phenotypes (MP terms) associated with the specified mouse genes or other features.

query.name: _Genotype_Disease
query.longDescription: Returns the diseases (MEDIC terms) associated with the specified mouse genotypes.

query.name: _Genotype_Phenotype
query.longDescription: Returns the phenotypes (MP terms) associated with the specified mouse genotypes.

query.name: _Phenotype_Allele
query.longDescription: Returns the mouse alleles associated with the specified phenotypes (MP terms) or subterms.

query.name: _Phenotype_Feature
query.longDescription: Returns genes and other sequence features associated with the specified phenotypes (MP terms) or their subterms.

query.name: _Phenotype_Genotype
query.longDescription: Returns genes and other sequence features associated with the specified phenotypes (MP terms) or their subterms.

query.name: AllGXD
query.view: GXDExpression.assayType GXDExpression.image GXDExpression.specimenNum GXDExpression.sex GXDExpression.age GXDExpression.stage GXDExpression.emaps GXDExpression.assayId GXDExpression.probe GXDExpression.strength GXDExpression.pattern GXDExpression.detected GXDExpression.note

query.name: Convert_Gene_to_GO
query.longDescription: Excludes "NOT" annotations by default.

template.name: Convert_Gene_to_GOTerm
template.title: Gene to GO term list converter.

template.name: Convert_Gene_To_ProteinDomain
template.title: Gene to protein domain list converter

template.name: Convert_Gene_To_SPProtein
template.title: Gene to SwissProt protein list converter

template.name: Convert_Protein_To_ProteinDomain
template.title: Protein to protein domain list converter

template.name: Convert_ProteinDomain_To_Gene
template.title: Protein domain to gene list converter

template.name: Convert_ProteinDomain_To_Protein
template.title: Protein domain to protein list converter

query.name: Coords_Features
query.view: SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.start SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.end SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.strand SequenceFeature.organism.shortName SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.symbol SequenceFeature.name SequenceFeature.sequenceOntologyTerm.name
query.longDescription:
Returns genome features contained within a specified coordinate range for the specified species.
(See also the Region Search tab.)
query.constraintLogic: A and C and D and E

query.name: domain_protein_gene
query.longDescription: Show proteins which have a specified protein domain or family.

query.name: EMAPAInteraction_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.expression.structure.name Gene.expression.stage Gene.expression.assayType Gene.expression.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: List all genes that are expressed in a given structure/stage and have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specific gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

constraint.description: Show gense that are expressed in:
that also have protein-protein interactions with Gene:
at Theiler Stage:

query.name: EMAPAInteraction_Genes_New
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.expression.structure.name Gene.expression.stage Gene.expression.assayType Gene.expression.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: List all genes that are expressed in a given structure/stage and have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specific gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

constraint.description: Show gense that are expressed in:
that also have protein-protein interactions with Gene:

query.name: Feature_crossrefs
query.longDescription: Returns database xrefs/links for the specified genome features.

query.name: Feature_overlapping
query.longDescription: Returns genome features that overlap the specified features.

query.name: Gene_Expression
query.view: GXDExpression.assayType GXDExpression.feature.symbol GXDExpression.feature.primaryIdentifier GXDExpression.stage GXDExpression.age GXDExpression.structure.name GXDExpression.strength GXDExpression.pattern GXDExpression.genotype.symbol GXDExpression.sex GXDExpression.assayId GXDExpression.probe GXDExpression.image GXDExpression.publication.mgiJnum
query.longDescription: Returns expression annotations for the specified gene(s).

query.name: Gene_Interactions
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show protein-protein interaction data for specified gene(s).

constraint.description: Show all protein-protein interactions for gene:

query.name: Gene_Interactions2
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show protein-protein interaction data for specified gene(s).

constraint.description: Show all protein-protein interactions for gene:

query.name: Gene_Interactions_New
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show protein-protein interaction data for specified gene(s).

constraint.description: Show all protein-protein interactions for gene:

query.name: Gene_Ortholog
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Returns homologs of specified genes.

query.name: Gene_protein
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.isFragment Gene.proteins.dataSets.name Gene.proteins.comments.type Gene.proteins.comments.description
query.longDescription: For the specified mouse gene(s), returns the associated proteins. This includes both Swiss-Prot and Trembl sequences.

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.isFragment Gene.proteins.dataSets.name Gene.proteins.comments.type Gene.proteins.comments.description
query.longDescription: For the specified mouse gene(s), returns the associated proteins. This includes both Swiss-Prot and Trembl sequences.

query.name: Gene_protein2
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.isFragment Gene.proteins.dataSets.name Gene.proteins.comments.type Gene.proteins.comments.description

query.name: Gene_proteindomain
query.longDescription: Show protein domain information for the proteins of a specified mouse gene.

constraint.description: Show domains for the proteins of gene:

query.name: GO_Interaction_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given GO term and that have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specific gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show gene annotated with GO term
that also have protein-protein interactions with Gene:

query.name: GO_Interaction_Genes_New
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given GO term and that have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specific gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show gene annotated with GO term
that also have protein-protein interactions with Gene:

template.name: GO_MFeatures
template.title: Functions (GO terms and children) --> Mouse features

query.name: GO_MFeatures
query.longDescription: Returns mouse features associated with specified GO terms (and any children of this GO term).

constraint.value: GOTerm to Mouse Marker Annotations from MGI

query.name: GO_MFeatures_NoChildren
query.longDescription: Returns mouse features associated with specified GO terms.

constraint.value: GOTerm to Mouse Marker Annotations from MGI

template.name: GO_MFeatures_NoNamespace
template.title: Functions (GO terms and children) --> Mouse features

query.name: GO_MFeatures_NoNamespace
query.longDescription: Returns mouse features associated with specified GO terms (and any children of this GO term).

constraint.value: GOTerm to Mouse Marker Annotations from MGI

template.name: GO_MFeatures_NoPubs
template.title: Functions (GO terms and children) --> Mouse features

query.name: GO_MFeatures_NoPubs
query.longDescription: Returns mouse features associated with specified GO terms (and any children of this GO term).

constraint.value: GOTerm to Mouse Marker Annotations from MGI

query.name: GO_Publications
query.longDescription: Returns publications related to specified function (GO) terms, i.e., those cited by annotations involving those terms (and any children of the GO terms).

query.name: GO_Publications_NoChildren
query.longDescription: Returns publications related to specified function (GO) terms, i.e., those cited by annotations involving those terms.

query.name: HDisease_HGene
query.longDescription: Returns human genes associated with specified human diseases.

constraint.value: DiseaseTerm to Human Marker Annotations from MGI

query.name: HDisease_MGene
query.longDescription: Returns mouse genes associated with (modeling) specified human diseases.

query.name: HDisease_MModel
query.longDescription: Returns mouse models (genotypes) associated with (modeling) specified human diseases.

query.name: HDisease_Publications
query.longDescription: Returns mouse model publications for the specified disease (MEDIC) terms.

constraint.value: DiseaseTerm to Mouse Genotype Annotations from MGI

query.name: HGene_HDisease
query.longDescription: Returns human diseases (MEDIC terms) associated with specified human genes.

constraint.value: DiseaseTerm to Human Marker Annotations from MGI

template.name: HGene_MPhenotype
template.title: Human genes --> Phenotypes of mouse orthologs

query.name: HGene_MPhenotype
query.longDescription: Returns the phenotypes of mice with mutations in the orthologs of the specified human genes.
query.constraintLogic: A and D and J and B

query.name: Lookup_Features
query.view: SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.symbol SequenceFeature.name SequenceFeature.sequenceOntologyTerm.name SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.start SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.end SequenceFeature.chromosomeLocation.strand SequenceFeature.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Returns genome features that match a specified string. (ID, symbol, name, synonym) for the specified species.

query.name: Lookup_GO
query.longDescription: Returns GO terms that match specified search string.

query.name: Lookup_HDisease
query.longDescription: Returns human disease (MEDIC) terms the match the specified search string.

query.name: Lookup_MAlleles
query.longDescription: Returns mouse alleles matching the given string.

query.name: Lookup_MPhenotype
query.longDescription: Returns MP terms whose names match the specified search terms.

query.name: MAllele_Genotype
query.view: Allele.primaryIdentifier Allele.symbol Allele.name Allele.genotypes.primaryIdentifier Allele.genotypes.zygosity Allele.genotypes.symbol Allele.genotypes.background.name Allele.genotypes.background.strainType
query.longDescription: Returns genotypes (aka mouse models) carrying any of the specified alleles.

query.name: MAllele_HDisease
query.longDescription: Returns human diseases (MEDIC terms) modeled by mice carrying specified alleles.

query.name: MAllele_MPhenotype
query.longDescription: Returns phenotypes (MP terms) displayed by mice carrying specified alleles.

query.name: MFeature_GO
query.longDescription: Returns GO terms associated with specified mouse features.

constraint.value: GOTerm to Mouse Marker Annotations from MGI

query.name: MFeature_HDisease
query.longDescription: Returns human diseases (MEDIC terms) modeled by mice with mutations in the specified genes.

query.name: MFeature_MAllele
query.view: SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.symbol SequenceFeature.alleles.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.alleles.symbol SequenceFeature.alleles.name SequenceFeature.alleles.alleleType
query.longDescription: Returns alleles of the specified features.

query.name: MFeature_Publication
query.view: SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.symbol SequenceFeature.publications.mgiJnum SequenceFeature.publications.pubMedId SequenceFeature.publications.firstAuthor SequenceFeature.publications.journal SequenceFeature.publications.title SequenceFeature.publications.year
query.longDescription: Returns publications for the specified mouse features.

template.name: MPhenotype_MGenotype
template.title: Mammalian phenotypes (MP terms) --> Mouse genes and models

query.name: MPhenotype_MGenotype
query.longDescription: Returns mouse genes (or other sequence features) associated with the specified phenotypes (MP terms), along with the models (genotypes) in which the phenotypes were observed.

query.name: MPhenotype_Publications
query.longDescription: Returns publications associated with the specified MP term(s). These pubs were used in phenotype annotations.

constraint.value: MPTerm to Mouse Genotype Annotations from MGI

query.name: MPInteraction_Genes
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given phenotype term and that have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specified gene(s).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with MP term:

query.name: MPInteraction_Genes_New
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given phenotype term and that have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specified gene(s).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with MP term:

query.name: MQTL_MFeature
query.longDescription: Returns features that overlap specified mouse QTL.

query.name: Organism_genes
query.longDescription: Returns all genes for the specified organism.

query.name: protein_domain
query.view: Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.uniprotName Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.name Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.type Protein.proteinDomainRegions.start Protein.proteinDomainRegions.end Protein.proteinDomainRegions.identifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.database
query.longDescription: Show protein domains and families for the specified protein.

constraint.description: Show domains and families for protein:

template.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
template.title: Protein --> Gene.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from protein class - Philip

query.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.end Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Protein.genes.length
query.longDescription: Show the gene that codes for the following protein, with its chromosomal location and length.

query.name: Protein_GOterms
query.longDescription: For a given Protein (or List of Proteins), returns the associated Gene Ontology (GO) terms. Optionally, you can specify Ontology category (eg. cellular_component, molecular_function, biological_process: OFF returns All).

constraint.description: Turn Off to retrieve all GO

query.name: protein_interactions
query.view: Gene.proteins.uniprotAccession Gene.proteins.uniprotName Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.name Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a specified protein, show physical and genetic interaction partners. Optionally constrain to show just physical or genetic interactions or interactions determined by a specific method.

constraint.description: Show interactions for protein:
Only show interactions of type:
Only show interactions determined by method:

query.name: Publication_Expression
query.view: GXDExpression.assayType GXDExpression.feature.symbol GXDExpression.feature.primaryIdentifier GXDExpression.stage GXDExpression.structure.name GXDExpression.strength GXDExpression.pattern GXDExpression.genotype.symbol GXDExpression.sex GXDExpression.age GXDExpression.assayId GXDExpression.probe GXDExpression.image GXDExpression.publication.mgiJnum
query.longDescription: Returns expression annotations for the specified publication(s).

query.name: Publication_GO
query.longDescription: Returns gene functions (GO terms) reported in specified publication(s).

query.name: Publication_HDisease
query.longDescription: Returns human diseases (MEDIC terms) reported in specified publication(s).

query.name: Publication_MFeature
query.view: Publication.mgiJnum Publication.pubMedId Publication.firstAuthor Publication.journal Publication.title Publication.year Publication.bioEntities.primaryIdentifier Publication.bioEntities.symbol Publication.bioEntities.name Publication.bioEntities.mgiType
query.longDescription: Returns mouse features associated with the specified publication(s).

query.name: Publication_MPhenotypes
query.longDescription: Returns phenotypes (MP terms) annotated from specified publication(s).

query.name: Q_Allele_by_categories
query.longDescription: Simple query form for finding alleles by "categories", i.e., by type, allele-attribute, and/or projectCollection.
query.constraintLogic: A and C and B and D and E

constraint.description: (generation method)
(other aspects / functional consequences)
(where it came from)

query.name: Structure_Expression
query.view: GXDExpression.assayType GXDExpression.feature.symbol GXDExpression.feature.primaryIdentifier GXDExpression.stage GXDExpression.age GXDExpression.structure.name GXDExpression.strength GXDExpression.pattern GXDExpression.genotype.symbol GXDExpression.sex GXDExpression.assayId GXDExpression.probe GXDExpression.image GXDExpression.publication.mgiJnum
query.longDescription: Returns expression annotations for the specified anatomical structure(s).

query.name: Term_Ancestors
query.longDescription: Returns the given term(s) and all their descendant terms.

query.name: Term_Descendants
query.longDescription: Returns the given term(s) and all their descendant terms.

query.view: Gene.id Gene.symbol Gene.expression.assayType Gene.expression.stage Gene.expression.publication.pubMedId Gene.expression.structure.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.id
query.longDescription: List all genes that are expressed in a given structure/stage and have been shown to interact (protein-protein) with a specific gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

that also have protein-protein interactions with Gene:
